alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:36PM CDT until August 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MOWER AND WESTERN FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 735 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spring Valley, or 14 miles west of Preston, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wykoff around 745 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads 2 And 38, Etna, Highways 63 And 16, Hamilton, Cherry Grove, Fillmore and County Roads 2 And 101. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
